statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM transactions;
SELECT merchant, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, merchant FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01' AND transaction_type = 'refund' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT account_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY account_id HAVING average_amount > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT account_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date <= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_cases WHERE fraud_status = FALSE;
SELECT case_id, case_description FROM fraud_cases WHERE case_id < 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, account_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 12345 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, f.case_description FROM transactions t INNER JOIN fraud_cases f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.fraud_status = TRUE;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, fraud_flag FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT case_id, case_description, case_status FROM fraud_cases WHERE case_status = 'pending';
SELECT anomaly_id, anomaly_description, anomaly_type FROM anomalies ORDER BY anomaly_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type
SELECT * FROM fraud_cases WHERE case_status = 'active' AND case_description LIKE '%fraud%'
SELECT anomaly_id, anomaly_description, anomaly_type FROM anomalies ORDER BY anomaly_id ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT account_id, amount, category FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='1234567890'
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type='savings' AND balance > 1000
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, category, amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT transaction_id, reason, flagged FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged = true
